body:
The perfect way to spend your day in Santa Barbara. You'll experience a fun and exciting cruise while enjoying beautiful views of the coast and the channel islands. This 50' Catamaran offers 1400 square feet of deck space while the multi-hull construction makes her comfortable, stable & safe. You'll find plenty of room for you and a guest or a large party. On board you'll find a beer, wine and soda bar. Light snacks and restrooms are on hand for your convenience. Friday nights we offer live music cruises for a relaxing atmosphere.

Note: Music cruises run from June 1st - August 31st only.
priceLong:
**$60 per person**

Live Music Cruises: **$70 per person** (Friday nights only)
timeLong: Time varies based on sunset time - please call with questions about specific dates
title: Sunset Sailing Cruise
